---
title: "Top Biomarkers"
---


```{r, warning=FALSE,message=FALSE,echo = FALSE, fig.width = 6}
library(data.table)
library(DT)

library(tidyr)
library(dplyr)

biomarkers <-fread("data/top_biomarkers.tsv")
dt <- biomarkers[ order(-biomarkers$n.clinical.trials),] 
datatable(dt , caption = "Table 1: Top 50 biomarkers in Clinical Trials" ,  filter = 'top', options = list(pageLength = 10, scrollX = TRUE,   autoWidth = F), rownames = F)

```
